an10.171:4.1: * “Adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo anattho ca;
an10.171:4.3: Adhammañca viditvā anatthañca, dhammañca viditvā atthañca yathā dhammo yathā attho tathā paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
an10.171:5.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, adhammo ca anattho ca?
an10.171:5.2: Pāṇātipāto, adinnādānaṃ, kāmesumicchācāro, musāvādo, pisuṇā vācā, pharusā vācā, samphappalāpo, abhijjhā, byāpādo, micchādiṭṭhi—
an10.171:5.3: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, adhammo ca anattho ca.
an10.171:6.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, dhammo ca attho ca?
an10.171:6.2: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī, adinnādānā veramaṇī, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī, musāvādā veramaṇī, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī, samphappalāpā veramaṇī, anabhijjhā, abyāpādo, sammādiṭṭhi—
an10.171:6.3: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammo ca attho ca.
an10.171:7.3: Adhammañca viditvā anatthañca, dhammañca viditvā atthañca yathā dhammo yathā attho tathā paṭipajjitabban’ti, iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttan”ti.
